sn45.180:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.180:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn45.180:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabboti.
sn45.180:2.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo.
sn45.180:2.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti ragavinayapariyosanam dosavinayapariyosanam mohavinayapariyosanam …
sn45.180:2.10: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya ayam ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavetabbo”ti.
